Package gw.api.print

Class PrintNoteAction

java.lang.Object
gw.api.print.PrintAction
gw.api.print.AbstractCCPrintAction
gw.api.print.PrintOutAction
gw.api.print.PrintNoteAction
public class PrintNoteAction extends PrintOutAction
Action to a print event for a single note. This action is bound to the printLinkAction of the Note widget and should never be used outside that context.
Author:
pyoung

    • generatePrintoutContent

      protected void generatePrintoutContent(IPrintContext context, String choice) throws IOException
      Prints an individual note applying given print settings. Uses the thread local CurrentEventSource set by GosuActionListener to print the widget on which this method is invoked.
